refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis
refsynopsisdiv.para: Used to control the exclusion declarations on elements with exclusions.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The *.exclusion parameter entities parameterize element exclusions. You can selectively include or remove elements from the exclusion by changing the appropriate parameter entity.
In the XML version of DocBook V4, there are no inclusion entities because inclusions are not part of XML.
